name: Sausage Spinach Alfredo Lasagna
author: Barb Abbey
summary: My husband does not like tomato sauce, so this is a delicious alternative. Spicy sausage gives it a kick!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
¾ (16 ounce) package no-boil lasagna noodles
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a skillet over medium heat, cook the sausage until evenly brown
Drain, and mix in the spinach and
Continue cooking until spinach and sauce are heated through
In a bowl, mix the Cheddar cheese, ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and egg
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, layer 1/3 of the sausage mixture, 1/3 of the noodles, and 1/3 of the cheese mixture
Repeat layers twice, and top with mozzarella cheese
Cover, and bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven
